page.title: 19HOME LIFE IN 1985 01
page.content:
Families like wathcing television and nearly everybody has one. Video and computer games are popular too, but we don't all have one.
The majority of us have bikes and a lot of boys have a BMX. Most of us have pets, mainly dogs, cats and fish.
Although there are lots of cars on the road, we either come to school by bus or some of us walk. We read books, comics and magazines in our spare time. Some families like to visit grandparents during weekends and families go out during holidays.
